Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: There is an odd sign on the east side of the road reading "The Glyph Master".
Room.LongDescription: Riverdell Way continues to the north and south, traveling through the eastern section of town. On the east side of the road is a funny shop called "The Glyph Master", a sort of fortune telling/deciphering store where you can probably figure out what a number of the cryptic scrolls and writings mean.
